TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_bgax, title = bgax, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/bgax} }

S.FORM: bgax (ke' na Plmukan: ) ga qutux spiyang qaya' qaya na hi' mlikuy. Kya kwara' bgax na mlikuy hiya'. Ana ga, ungat kwara' bgax na kneril nya'.
